name: Tears Of Izanagi
description:
Tears Of Izanagi

Tears Of Izanagi is a reinterpreted Space Invaders clone that I made as part of an Unity course at udemy. I invested some extra time to produce the artwork and music. It's a HTML5/WebGL build and still a prototype. In Chrome SFX will only play on right channel. This will be fixed in a future release.

You get: Infinite creatures to shoot at. The idea is inspired by the Japanese myth of Izanagi and Izanami. The players' projectile is a Japanese outcry towards the enemies that can be translated as "Retreat!".

If you like the music you can also listen to it at SoundCloud.
